itunes:title: #103: How to Know When You Are Done with Your Healing Process
title: #103: How to Know When You Are Done with Your Healing Process
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: One of the most common questions I get from my clients as we start working together is “how do I know when this is all going to be over?” The truth is many of my clients are dealing with terrible, horrific, and painful stuff that they don’t want...
itunes:summary:
One of the most common questions I get from my clients as we start working together is “how do I know when this is all going to be over?” The truth is many of my clients are dealing with terrible, horrific, and painful stuff that they don’t want to deal with anymore.

 

In today’s episode, I share the answer that I’ll give to you if you find yourself asking the same question. It’s not the prettiest answer, but it’s the best answer I have for you. I also share some smaller ways of noticing the real impact happening in your life.

 

Healing is not black and white, and the idea of never having any issues or disappointments  in your relationships, bank account, and other aspects of your life is unrealistic. It is my hope that the 3 different steps I share with you will help you notice just how far you’ve come and are continuing to go with your healing process. 

 

RESOURCES MENTIONED

  • The Healed and Loved Woman Membership
  • Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to 832-219-7815
  • Get our free download - The 5 Step Roadmap to Heal Love Addiction
  • Apply to work together in the Recovery School  - Click here to pre-apply!
  • Learn that YOU ARE WORTHY  - Enroll in You Are Worthy here

 

CONNECT WITH US ELSEWHERE

Facebook: Black Girls Heal

Website: Blackgirlsheal.org
